department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.en: "This course provides a comprehensive, thorough, and up-to-date treatment of engineering and biological mathematics. It is intended to introduce students of engineering, physics, mathematics, computer science, and related fields to those areas of applied mathematics that are most relevant for solving practical problems."
goal.ch: 內容將專注於生物醫學以及生物應用工程等領域之理論，包括：生物數學模型之建立、微分方程及動態系統之討論，以及非線性方法等。因此，理論教授與傳統工程數學章節之安排略有不同。實作方面將配合以程式語言針對各種基礎科學或是工程個案，提出適當之數值分析。本門課程將以深入淺出方式引導學生先行體驗工程數學問題、理解問題，而後思考解決問題之方法與手段。

content.en:
"Week 1-2 system of linear differential equations
Week 3-8 system of non-linear differential equations
Week 9 exam
Week 10-12 orthogonal functions and Fourier series
Week 13-17 boundary-value problems
Week 18 exam"
content.ch:
"第01-02週 線性微分方程系統
第03-08週 非線性微分方程系統
第09週 期中考
第10-12週 正交函數與傅立葉級數
第13-17週 邊界值問題
第18週 期末考

textbook.en:
"1. Advanced Engineering Mathematics, W. S. Wright, 4th
2. Mathematical Models in Biology by J. Muller, TUM, Centre for Mathematical Sciences, 2004"
textbook.ch:

en.competency: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning
